name: Terra Space Program
description:
Hi, this is my very first game jam and my third game overall.

Try to destroy 60 asteroids without dying.

Your final score will be calculated with the health points remaining and the amount of rockets launched.

KEYS

  • Left mouse click to shoot rockets.
  • ESC to pause.

POWERUPS:

  • Laser satellites at 15 asteroids destroyed.
  • Automatic mega rockets at 30 asteroids destroyed.
  • Some weapons upgrade at 45 asteroids destroyed.

I think this is a really difficult game, but I managed to win without taking a single hit.

CREDITS:

  • Programming and art - me.
  • Music - my father.
